skillTree.localised_description: The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Soaked in and toughened by embalming fluid, the cloth bindings used to mummify afford the wearer additional protection from all but a direct hit from mortal projectiles.
Souls retrieved from the Netherwold and bound to their controller provide a degree of magical resistance.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: The sacred carrion who serve Ualatp can find much among the lost and abandoned in the desert.

skillTree.localised_description: The thief was thrown into the pit, and for a moment it seemed as though Sokth would spare his follower. But then the scorpions enveloped him, and after a brief muffled shrieking, he was neither seen nor heard from again.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: Reaching behind the wall of death to bring back the soul and bind it to you takes skill, but like anything, practice makes perfect!
The strength at the base of the pillar; the venom of the cobra and the asp.
Hatred this strong is infectious, contagious, and inescapable.
The Necrotects despise almost everything, save of course, for the things they have designed themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Animated by a ceremony of awakening, the Tomb Scorpion's carapace is infused with residual power from the corpse within to swarm and kill the enemies of its master.
The faces of the gods gaze down from their daises, imposing monuments to Nehekhara's former prestige.
The master of the necrotectural art understands all aspects of the construction process; inspiration, labour, time and cost are all within his Undead grasp.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: To carve a Necrosphinx is to manifest the greatest and most destructive creature of the underworld. Not all Necrotects were adept at bringing such constructions to Unlife - only the most gifted of their trade even dare.

The leonine statues, known as Warsphinxes, were first constructed in Khemri; and so it is Necrotects who hail from the first city are the greatest carvers of these magnificent and deadly stone beasts.
No expense was spared in sculpting a Hierotitan - the greatest and most talented of Necrotects were contracted to work on the blessed stone that would form these gigantic statues.
That which was stone, arise! Bone and bronze and leather and tar, creature of power awake and visit destruction on the enemies of Khemri!
It is not possible to defeat such unshakeable spirit once its owner's mind is made up.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
He whose will transcends death can strike out from beyond the grave, to devastating effect.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Death is not an impedance to the strongest of wills.
Beware the scorpion's sting, hidden 'neath the desert sands yet always poised to strike.
The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: I can procure anything an agent might need for any mission.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!
The people of the desert live and die by their oaths in Basth's graceful sight.
